ActJudges Act
SubjectMariette Gonthier ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Charles Joseph Doherty Gonthier
PrecisGranting of an annuity to MARIETTE GONTHIER, widow of the Honourable Charles Joseph Doherty Gonthier, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, effective July 18, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
